egypt.name: Egypt
egypt.description: Home to the Pyramids of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

libya.name: Libya
libya.description: Showcasing the majestic ruins of Leptis Magna, a prominent city of the Roman Empire.

algeria.name: Algeria
algeria.description: The Martyrs' Memorial (Maqam Echahid) stands tall, commemorating the Algerian war for independence.

nigeria.name: Nigeria
nigeria.description: A grand mosque is depicted, representing the rich architectural heritage and cultural diversity of West Africa.

kenya.name: Kenya
kenya.description: A sanctuary for wildlife, represented here by a rhinoceros. Kenya's national parks are crucial for conservation.

tanzania.name: Tanzania
tanzania.description: The 'King of the Savanna', the lion, is illustrated before Mount Kilimanjaro, capturing iconic Serengeti scenery.

south_africa.name: South Africa
south_africa.description: The African elephant stands near the King Protea, the national flower, symbolizing the nation's rich biodiversity.

namibia.name: Namibia
namibia.description: A giraffe, the tallest land animal, roams the plains, evoking the vast landscapes of Etosha National Park.

madagascar.name: Madagascar
madagascar.description: The unique Avenue of the Baobabs showcases the island's extraordinary and distinct flora.
